mapper.select: select MNumber as memberNumber, MId as memberId, MOPosition as department from ${dbPrefixName}new_center.inp_member where MStatus = '재직' and MId = #{memberId} and MPassword = PASSWORD(#{password})
mapper.insert: insert into common.refreshToken ( token, insertDateTime, expirationDateTime, ip, memberId ) values ( #{token}, now(), date_add(now(), interval 12 hour), #{ip}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: select token, insertDateTime, expirationDateTime, ip, memberId from common.refreshToken where token = #{token} and expirationDateTime > now()
